name: Dragon (SEUCK Game)
overview: Released in Stonysoft #0104, Stonysoft-PD #0519 and in Italy in the Byte Games n.24 (ottobre 1988) compilation. As the legend goes, there was a great and brave King, ruler of all the lands of the North who at the moment of his marriage with the princess of the South was transformed into a dragon by a jealous magician. To break the spell you will have to wander the immense lands of the west and find some precious gems, which is not an easy task as you will have to deal with numerous, fearsome monsters.
